On this page

Super Admin Guide ​

Complete guide for Super Administrators with platform-wide control.

Overview ​

Super Admins have the highest level of access with complete control over:

  • All organizations
  • System configuration
  • User management across organizations
  • Platform-wide reports and analytics
  • Security and compliance settings

Access ​

Login URL: /admin/login

Default Credentials (change immediately):

  • Email: superadmin@system.com
  • Password: SuperAdmin123!

Dashboard ​

The Super Admin dashboard provides:

  • Platform-wide statistics
  • Recent activity across all organizations
  • Pending organization approvals
  • System health metrics
  • Quick actions for common tasks

Organization Management ​

Approve Organizations ​

  1. Navigate to Organizations → Pending
  2. Review application details
  3. Verify submitted documents
  4. Click Approve or Reject
  5. Add notes if needed

Manage Active Organizations ​

  • View all organizations
  • Edit organization details
  • Suspend or activate organizations
  • View organization statistics
  • Manage organization admins

Organization Settings ​

Configure organization-specific settings:

  • Branding and customization
  • Feature access
  • User limits
  • Storage quotas
  • API access

User Management ​

Platform-Wide User Control ​

  • View all users across organizations
  • Search and filter users
  • Manage user roles and permissions
  • Suspend or delete accounts
  • Reset passwords
  • Verify email addresses manually

Role Assignment ​

Assign administrative roles:

  • Organization Admin: Full control within organization
  • Hall Admin: Location-specific control
  • Super Admin: Platform-wide control (use sparingly)

System Configuration ​

Platform Settings ​

  • General Settings: Platform name, logo, contact info
  • Email Configuration: SMTP settings, templates
  • Storage Settings: File upload limits, storage provider
  • Security Settings: Password policies, session timeouts
  • Feature Flags: Enable/disable platform features

Email Templates ​

Customize email templates:

  • Welcome emails
  • Verification emails
  • Password reset emails
  • Notification emails
  • Report emails

Branding ​

Configure platform branding:

  • Logo and favicon
  • Color scheme
  • Custom CSS
  • Footer content
  • Terms and privacy policy

Reports and Analytics ​

Platform Statistics ​

  • Total users and organizations
  • Item statistics (lost, found, claimed)
  • Claim success rates
  • User engagement metrics
  • Growth trends

Organization Comparison ​

  • Compare organization performance
  • Identify top-performing organizations
  • Track adoption rates
  • Monitor usage patterns

Export Data ​

  • Generate CSV/Excel reports
  • Schedule automated reports
  • Custom date ranges
  • Filter by organization or metrics

Security and Compliance ​

Security Monitoring ​

  • Monitor login attempts
  • Track suspicious activity
  • Review access logs
  • Manage IP restrictions
  • Configure 2FA requirements

Data Management ​

  • Backup and restore
  • Data retention policies
  • GDPR compliance tools
  • Data export requests
  • Account deletion requests

Audit Logs ​

  • View all administrative actions
  • Track system changes
  • Monitor user activity
  • Export audit logs
  • Set up alerts

System Maintenance ​

Updates and Patches ​

  • Apply system updates
  • Manage dependencies
  • Test new features
  • Roll back changes if needed

Performance Monitoring ​

  • Monitor server resources
  • Track response times
  • Identify bottlenecks
  • Optimize database queries

Backup Management ​

  • Configure backup schedules
  • Test backup restoration
  • Monitor backup status
  • Manage backup storage

Best Practices ​

  1. Regular Monitoring: Check dashboard daily
  2. Prompt Approvals: Review organization applications quickly
  3. Security First: Maintain strong security practices
  4. Documentation: Keep detailed notes of changes
  5. Communication: Inform users of system changes
  6. Backup Verification: Regularly test backups
  7. Performance Optimization: Monitor and optimize regularly

Troubleshooting ​

Common Issues ​

Organization approval delays: Check email notifications, verify documents User access issues: Verify roles and permissions Performance problems: Check server resources, optimize queries Email delivery failures: Verify SMTP settings, check logs

Support ​

For Super Admin support:

  • Technical documentation
  • System administrator guides
  • Emergency contact procedures
  • Escalation protocols

Super Admins are responsible for the overall health and success of the platform.
